question.text: Which of the following statement is true with respect to inert-pair effect?

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> is oxidising agent while <math><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> is reducing agent

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> and <math><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> are both oxidising agent and reducing agent

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> is reducing agent while <math><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> is oxidising agent

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> is reducing agent while <math><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> is oxidising agent

solution.text:
Due to inert-pair effect,stability of +2 oxidation state increases down the group in carbon family.
Sn 2+ →unstable[good reducing agent] Pb 4+ →unstable[good oxdising agent]
